message.name: ERR_CONDITION_NAME_ALREADY_EXIST
message.locale: A condition with this Name already exists.

message.name: ERR_CONDITION_STARTDATE_AFTER_ENDDATE
message.locale: The End Date must be later than or equal to the Start Date.

message.name: ERR_CONDITION_RECORD_NOT_FOUND
message.locale: The requested record not found.

message.name: ERR_CONDITION_NAME_TRANSLATION_DUPLICATE
message.locale: A condition name translation for this language has already been created.

message.name: ERR_CONDITION_DEL_ALREADY_CANCELLED
message.locale: This condition has already been deleted.

message.name: ERR_CONDITION_DEL_HAS_ASSOCIATED_DETERMINATIONS
message.locale: This condition has an associated determination configuration and cannot be deleted.

message.name: ERR_CONDITION_DEL_HAS_ASSOCIATED_ICDCODES
message.locale: This condition has associated ICD codes and cannot be deleted.

message.name: ERR_CONDITION_ICDCODE_ASSOCIATION_STARTDATE_BEFORE_CONDITION_STARTDATE
message.locale: The Start Date cannot be earlier than the associated condition start date, %1d.

message.name: ERR_CONDITION_ICDCODE_ASSOCIATION_STARTDATE_BEFORE_ICDCODE_STARTDATE
message.locale: The Start Date cannot be earlier than the start date of the associated ICD code, %1d.

message.name: ERR_CONDITION_ICDCODE_ASSOCIATION_ICDCODE_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: This ICD Code is already associated with this Condition for this period.

message.name: ERR_CONDITION_ICDCODE_ASSOCIATION_STARTDATE_AFTER_ENDDATE
message.locale: The Start Date cannot be later than the End Date.

message.name: ERR_CONDITION_ICDCODE_ASSOCIATION_ENDDATE_AFTER_CONDITION_ENDDATE
message.locale: The End Date cannot be later than the end date of the associated condition, %1d.

message.name: ERR_CONDITION_ICDCODE_ASSOCIATION_ENDDATE_AFTER_ICDCODE_ENDDATE
message.locale: The End Date cannot be later than the end date of the associated ICD code, %1d.

message.name: ERR_CONDITION_ICDCODE_ASSOCIATION_MODIFY_STARTDATE_BEFORE_CONDITION_STARTDATE
message.locale: The Start Date cannot be earlier than the start date of the associated condition, %1d.

message.name: ERR_CONDITION_INVALID_SEARCH_COMBINATION_NAME_AND_ICDCODE
message.locale: Name and ICD code can not be entered together. Please remove one and search again.

message.name: ERR_CONDITION_INVALID_SEARCH_COMBINATION_TYPE_AND_ICDCODE
message.locale: Type and ICD code can not be entered together. Please remove one and search again.

message.name: ERR_CONDITION_INVALID_SEARCH_COMBINATION_NAME_AND_ICDTEXT
message.locale: Name and ICD text can not be entered together. Please remove one and search again.

message.name: ERR_CONDITION_INVALID_SEARCH_COMBINATION_TYPE_AND_ICDTEXT
message.locale: Type and ICD text can not be entered together. Please remove one and search again.

message.name: ERR_CONDITION_MODIFY_ALREADY_CANCELLED
message.locale: This condition may not be modified as it has already been deleted.

message.name: ERR_CONDITION_NAME_EMPTY
message.locale: Name must be entered.

message.name: ERR_CONDITION_ICDCODE_ASSOCIATION_STARTDATE_AFTER_CONDITION_ENDDATE
message.locale: The Start Date must not be later than the end date of the condition, %1d.

message.name: ERR_CONDITION_ICDCODE_ASSOCIATION_STARTDATE_AFTER_ICDCODE_ENDDATE
message.locale: The Start Date must not be later than the end date of the ICD Code, %1d.

message.name: ERR_CONDITION_ICDCODE_ASSOCIATION_EXIST_FOR_ANOTHER_CONDITION
message.locale: This ICD Code is already associated with condition %1d.

message.name: ERR_CONDITION_STARTDATE_AFTER_ICDCODE_ASSOCIATION_STARTDATE
message.locale: The Start Date must not be later than the start date of the association with the ICD Code, %1d.
